title: 6.6: The Rise of the Warrior
body:
Now I know a lot of you have seen the PBE changes for 6.6 and you probably think I am crazy as the warrior enchant hasn't been touched whatsoever.... but with the nerf of devourer and several other key changes to itemization, as well as the power of the early game in this meta, I think the warrior enchant has been flying under the radar in regards to its power levels and influence in the early game.

With sated junglers falling out of flavor, I think we'll see a lot more AD junglers rushing warrior enchant and trying to snowball the game pre level 9-12. 

Maybe I am crazy, but I think 6.6 will bring a lot of beneficial changes. Power farming sated was bad for the jungler mindset overall, maybe things will go back to the way they were.
